div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_blurb et_pb_blurb_10 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_blurb_position_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

li.span: . For law enforcement related questions and non-emergency related issues contact the Winooski PD, (802) 655-0221.
A confidential crisis hotline for Vermonters. First call for chittenden county is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. First Call provides phone and in person

crisis support. There is no wrong or bad reason to call. If you or a loved one is in need of help or support and you’re not sure what to do or where to get it, First Call of Chittenden County can help.
The Vermont Department of Mental Health says people in crisis can now send a text message to people trained to help them. The new,

provides round-the-clock support, seven days a week by providing access to the counselors via text messaging. Within five minutes, a return text will be sent followed by a response from a trained crisis counselor.
